paramInformation.label: HVAC System Type
paramInformation.description: Configures the type of heating system used.

paramInformation.label: Number of Heat Stages
paramInformation.description: Heat Stages 0-3 Default is 2.

paramInformation.label: Number of Cool Stages
paramInformation.description: Cool Stages 0-2 Default is 2.

paramInformation.label: Heat Fuel Type
paramInformation.description: Choose type of fuel. Reality - whether unit is boiler vs forced air.

paramInformation.label: Calibration Temperature
paramInformation.description: Calibration Temperature Range (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: Overshoot
paramInformation.description: Overshoot Range (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree. Default is 5.

paramInformation.label: Swing
paramInformation.description: Swing Range (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: Balance Setpoint
paramInformation.description: Balance Setpont Range (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: Recovery Settings
paramInformation.description: Whether thermostat uses intelligence to try and make the best of energy usage.

paramInformation.label: Fan Circulation Duty Cycle
paramInformation.description: Duty Cycle (percentage)

paramInformation.label: Fan Purge Time
paramInformation.description: Purge Time (in s)

paramInformation.label: Maximum Heat Setpoint
paramInformation.description: Max Heat Setpoint Range (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: Minimum Heat Setpoint
paramInformation.description: Min Heat Setpoint Range (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: Maximum Cool Setpoint
paramInformation.description: Max Cool Setpoint Range(in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: Minimum Cool Setpoint
paramInformation.description: Min Cool Setpoint (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: Thermostat Lock
paramInformation.description: Lock out physical thermostat controls.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Display Units
paramInformation.description: Celsius or Farenheit for temperature display.

paramInformation.label: HVAC Modes Enabled
paramInformation.description: Which heating/cooling modes are available.

options.label: Off, Heat, Cool, Auto, Emergency Heat

paramInformation.label: Configurable Terminal Setting
paramInformation.description: Changes control of configurable terminal

paramInformation.label: Power Source
paramInformation.description: Which source of power is utilized.

paramInformation.label: Battery Alert Threshold Low
paramInformation.description: Battery Alert Range (percentage)

paramInformation.label: Battery Alert Threshold Very Low
paramInformation.description: Very Low Battery Alert Range (percentage)

paramInformation.label: Remote Temperature Enable
paramInformation.description: Enables remote temperature sensor instead of built-in.

paramInformation.label: Heat Differential
paramInformation.description: Heat Differential (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: Cool Differential
paramInformation.description: Cool Differential (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: Temperature Reporting Threshold
paramInformation.description: Temperature Reporting Range (in deg. F) Precision is tenths of a degree.

paramInformation.label: O/B Select
paramInformation.description: Configuration of O/B terminal.

paramInformation.label: Z-Wave Echo Association Reports
paramInformation.description: Enable/Disabled Echo Assoc. Reports.
